Text.val: 14.08.2014 AS, I1408-00180 changed I/O to UTF-8 (was: ANSI)
04.04.2014 AS, SCR#19046 fixed print output if there's a IBAN (SEPA)
iso language code which we do use for some localized stuff on webpage (datepicker, ...) ...
protect from parameter manipulation by checking if client user has access to this account ....

SQL_STMT_U.val: select MIN(BADT_DATDAILYSTATEMENT) from :1/BADT where BADT_BANK_ADMNO=:2 AND BADT_BANK_LEDG_NO=:3 AND BADT_BANKID=:4 AND BADT_BANKACCOUNT=':5' AND BADT_DATDAILYSTATEMENT>':6'
select MAX(BADT_DATDAILYSTATEMENT) from :1/BADT where BADT_BANK_ADMNO=:2 AND BADT_BANK_LEDG_NO=:3 AND BADT_BANKID=:4 AND BADT_BANKACCOUNT=':5'

ExpSyntax.val: Trim(Str({1,7},'')) & '/' & Trim(Str({1,8},'')) & '/' & Trim({1,9}) & ' ' & DStr(Date(),'DD.MM.YYYY') & ' ' & TStr (Time(), ' HH:MM:SS')

SQL_STMT_U.val: select MAX(BADT_DATDAILYSTATEMENT) from :1/BADT where BADT_BANK_ADMNO=:2 AND BADT_BANK_LEDG_NO=:3 AND BADT_BANKID=:4 AND BADT_BANKACCOUNT=':5'
select MAX(BADT_DATDAILYSTATEMENT) from :1/BADT where BADT_BANK_ADMNO=:2 AND BADT_BANK_LEDG_NO=:3 AND BADT_BANKID=:4 AND BADT_BANKACCOUNT=':5' AND BADT_DATDAILYSTATEMENT<':6'
select MIN(BADT_DATDAILYSTATEMENT) from :1/BADT where BADT_BANK_ADMNO=:2 AND BADT_BANK_LEDG_NO=:3 AND BADT_BANKID=:4 AND BADT_BANKACCOUNT=':5'
